description:
Patricia is very interested in learning what it`s like to be a student. As she`s getting to know some friend she`s meeting for the first time, she ends up summoning a skeleton.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux qui ne se retournent pas lors de la distribution des polys
That Guy Who Never Turns Around When Handouts Are Distributed
プリント配るとき振り向かないやつ
